block.p: HALBERSTAM--David. The Board and Staff of The New York Foundation For The Arts extend our heartfelt condolences to our esteemed board member, Jean, and her daughter, Julia, on the sudden passing of David. Our thoughts are with you. Kathleen O'Grady, President Michael L. Royce, Executive Director. $(6$)HALBERSTAM--David, The staff of Parade magazine mourns the loss of a dear friend and colleague. In his nearly 30 years as a contributor to Parade, David was an eclectic voice on all matters of social significance -from the emergence of Korea as an industrial power to how baseball helped Americans bridge the racial divide. His professional accomplish ments are many and well documented. We were privileged to also know this great man personally. We will miss him. We extend our deepest sympathies to his wife, Jean, and daughter, Julia. Walter Anderson, Chairman, Parade
